title: New at andBeyond Lodges - Horse Riding Safari in Botswana
text:
New at andBeyond Lodges - Horse Riding Safari in Botswana New at andBeyond Lodges - Horse Riding Safari in Botswana Details Category: Hotel   13:50 One of the most thrilling and intimate ways to experience Africa is on horseback. andBeyond has partnered with Okavango Horse Safaris to offer horse riding safaris for guests staying at andBeyond Xaranna Okavango Delta Camp and andBeyond Xudum Okavango Delta Lodge in Botswana. 
The exhilarating rides explore the region’s untouched and beautiful landscape, officially named the 1,000th UNESCO World Heritage Site last year, and provide the opportunity to get up close to the native birds and wildlife including the giant horned kudu, secretary birds, cheetah, African wild dog, elephant, antelope, hippo and giraffe. All of the horses are of the highest quality and the rides are guided by an expert ranger. After a day wildlife spotting in the bush riders can return to one of the lodges, located in the heart of the wildlife concession, to relax and enjoy the striking views over the Delta. Both lodges have nine intimate safari tents complete with outdoor sala, private plunge pool, indoor bathtub and al fresco shower. *A half-day’s riding safari costs £311 per person and a full-day costs £467 per person* Related articles
